formalpara.title: Figure 5. Generating pENTRY-prom
formalpara.para: The attB4-prom-attB1R fragment is amplified with appropriate primers containing attB4 and attB1R sequences. attB4 and attB1R recombine with attP4 and atP1R of pDONR-P4-P1R, respectively, to generate pENTRY-prom in which the promoter is flanked by attL4 and attR1 sites.
